It performs drawing and event handling. * View is the base class for widget (buttons, text fields, etc.) * A ViewGroup is a subclass View that behaves like a container for more Views or other ViewGroups. * Layouts which are subclasses of ViewGroup class * Layouts are declared using the XML file main_layout.xml located in “res/layout ”
